sentences.sContent: This nation, famous for its unique fauna and flora, is now allowing applications for the professional export of its protected species to overseas zoological gardens.
sentences.sContent_eng: This nation, famous for its unique fauna and flora, is now allowing applications for the professional export of its protected species to overseas zoological gardens.
sentences.sCn: 该国以出产独特动物群和植物群闻名，如今开放专业申请将其保育类动物出口到海外的动物园去。

sentences.sContent: An emaciated cat quickly dropped from the ladder, watched something under vanilla jar, kept yelling out rudely, but Xiamen zoological garden people may not inquire what happened.
sentences.sContent_eng: An emaciated cat quickly dropped from the ladder, watched something under vanilla jar, kept yelling out rudely, but Xiamen zoological garden people may not inquire what happened.
sentences.sCn: 一只衰弱的大猫刷一声从梯子上摔下来，盯着有香草味的罐子并粗鲁地叫着，可厦门动物园的工作员对此置之不理！
